attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
CAMPAIGNERS have reacted with fury to the announcement that NOT all brave Gurkha veterans will be allowed to settle in Britain DESPITE a landmark court ruling. 
Only certain categories including the bravest or seriously injured will be allowed to come and stay after the Home Office ruled out a blanket policy.THEY SHOULD BE ALLOWED INTO BRITAIN THEY FOUGHT FOR US IN THE WAR THE GOVERNMENT ALLOW OTHERS INTO THE COUNTRY THAT DID NOTHING!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
